metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17081 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The gmc_mmx function in libavcodec/x86/mpegvideodsp.c in FFmpeg 2.3 and 3.4 does not properly validate widths and heights, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (integer signedness error and out-of-array read) via a crafted MPEG file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '65.0.3325.181-0ubuntu1').
ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:3.4.1-1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
